summary:
Mixed martial arts (MMA) is a tough sport where people fight using both punches and kicks (striking) and holds and throws (grappling). It combines moves from many different fighting styles from around the world.

MMA started getting popular in the 1990s, especially with the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). At first, there were few rules, but over time, more rules were added to make it safer. Now, MMA is a big sport with lots of fans, just like boxing.
title: Mixed martial arts
